parameters.definition: Maximum budget for mangos and guavas
Maximum guavas sold per month as a ratio of mangos sold

description: A food truck owner can spend at most \param{MaxBudget} on mangos and guavas. A mango costs the food truck owner \param{CostMango} and a guava costs him \param{CostGuava}. Spices are added and each mango is sold for a profit of \param{ProfitMango} while each guava is sold for a profit of \param{ProfitGuava}. The owner estimates that at least \param{MinMangos} mangos but at the most \param{MaxMangos} are sold each month. He also estimates that the number of guavas sold is at most a third of the mangos sold (expressed as \param{RatioGuavas} times the number of mangos). How many mangos and guavas should be sold in order to maximize the profit?
